summary: Nightwish is a popular Finnish metal band formed in 1996. The group's original members were Tuomas Holopainen, Emppu Vuorinen, Tarja Turunen, Jukka Nevalainen, and Sami Vänskä. They gained international success with albums like *Oceanborn* and *Wishmaster*. The album *Once* (2004) was a big hit, with the single "Wish I Had an Angel" getting lots of attention in the US. There have been several lineup changes over the years, with Anette Olzon and later Floor Jansen taking over as lead singer. Nightwish has won many awards and is one of Finland's best-selling bands.
title: Nightwish
